wikipedia_page.main: Narada Michael Bernard (born 30 November 1981 in Bristol) is a Jamaican-English former professional footballer, who played as a left-back. Bernard, who was capped for the Jamaica national team, is currently a personal trainer and was recently mentioned on That Peter Crouch Podcast.

link_mentions.page: List of Torquay United F.C. records and statistics

response: * Narada Bernard (b. 1981), a Jamaican football (soccer) player
